member.summary: Compiles lists of requested/required claims that should accompany any submitted Information Card.

A space-delimited list of claim type URIs for claims that may optionally be included in a submitted Information Card.

member.name: M:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.RenderSupportingScript
member.summary: Adds Javascript snippets to the page to help the Information Card selector do its work, or to downgrade gracefully if the user agent lacks an Information Card selector.

member.name: E:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.ReceivingToken
member.summary: Occurs when an InfoCard has been submitted but not decoded yet.

member.summary: Occurs when an InfoCard has been submitted and decoded.

member.name: E:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.TokenProcessingError
member.summary: Occurs when an InfoCard token is submitted but an error occurs in processing.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.ClaimsRequested
member.summary: Gets the set of claims that are requested from the Information Card.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.Issuer
member.summary: Gets or sets the issuer URI.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.IssuerPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the issuer policy URI.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.PrivacyUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to this site's privacy policy.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.PrivacyVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the privacy policy file.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.Audience
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI that must be found for the SAML token's intended audience in order for the token to be processed.
member.value: Typically the URI of the page hosting the control, or null to disable audience verification.
member.remarks: Disabling audience verification introduces a security risk because tokens can be redirected to allow access to unintended resources.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.AutoPostBack
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback will automatically be invoked when the user selects an Information Card.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.ImageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the standard InfoCard image to display.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.UnsupportedTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template to display when the user agent lacks an Information Card selector.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.RenderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a hidden region (either the unsupported or supported InfoCard HTML) collapses or merely becomes invisible when it is not to be displayed.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.AutoPopup
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the identity selector will be triggered at page load.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.HiddenFieldName
member.summary: Gets the name of the hidden field that is used to transport the token back to the server.

member.summary: Gets the id of the OBJECT tag that creates the InfoCard Selector.

member.summary: Gets the XML token, which will be encrypted if it was received over SSL.

member.name: P:DotNetOpenAuth.InfoCard.InfoCardSelector.TokenType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of token the page is prepared to receive.
